description: Updates the status of a partner integration.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The cluster identifier of the cluster whose partner integration status is being updated.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database whose partner integration status is being updated.

parameters.name: PartnerName
parameters.description: The name of the partner whose integration status is being updated.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The value of the updated status.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database that receives data from the partner.

nested_items.name: PartnerName
nested_items.description: The name of the partner that is authorized to send data.
